B

ball - Variable in class model.paint.strategy.BallPaintStrategy
Unit sized circle used as a prototype.
Ball - Class in model
The Ball class provides methods and fields that are common to all balls.
Ball() - Constructor for class model.Ball
No parameter constructor used for creating a null ball.
Ball(Point, int, Point, Color, Component, IUpdateStrategy<IBallCmd>, IPaintStrategy) - Constructor for class model.Ball
The following constructor takes all the parameters and assigns them to their respective fields in the ball.
BallModel - Class in model
The class that manages the creation, deletion and animation of the balls.
BallModel(IM2VAdapter) - Constructor for class model.BallModel
The BallModel constructor.
BallPaintStrategy - Class in model.paint.strategy
Paint strategy that paints a filled circle with the Ball's radius.
BallPaintStrategy() - Constructor for class model.paint.strategy.BallPaintStrategy
No parameter constructor that creates a 1 pixel radius ball at the origin.
BallPaintStrategy(AffineTransform, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class model.paint.strategy.BallPaintStrategy
Constructor that allows one to create the prototype ball of arbitrary dimension and location.
BirdSheepImagePaintStrategy - Class in model.paint.strategy
An example of an ImagePaintStrategy that randomly picks one of two animated image files to display when it is instantiated.
BirdSheepImagePaintStrategy() - Constructor for class model.paint.strategy.BirdSheepImagePaintStrategy
No-parameter constructor that randomly loads one of two files: model\paint\strategy\images\humbird4.gif or model\paint\strategy\images\img104c.gif with a fill factor of 0.5.
bounce() - Method in class model.Ball
The following method detecting if the edge of the ball is beyond the top/bottom left/right edge of the canvas.
BoxAndBallPaintStrategy - Class in model.paint.strategy
A composite upright strategy that contains a box and a ball.
BoxAndBallPaintStrategy() - Constructor for class model.paint.strategy.BoxAndBallPaintStrategy
No-parameter constructor that instantiates the AffineTransform for internal use.
BoxAndBallPaintStrategy(AffineTransform) - Constructor for class model.paint.strategy.BoxAndBallPaintStrategy
